name: Tales of the Abyss
description:
Tales of the Abyss is a RPG game developed by Namco Tales Studio. It came out on 15-12-2005. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Tales of the Abyss is available on Nintendo 3DS and PlayStation 2.
Makoto Yoshizumi produced the game. It was directed by Yoshito Higuchi. Motoi Sakuraba, Motoo Fujiwara and Shinji Tamura scored the game.
